rawtext.text: §lWhat Is Moneyz?
§rMoneyz is a §6Scoreboard §rsystem that allows Players to purchase and sell various items from §6NPC Shops.
§rYou can earn Moneyz by §6applying for Jobs §ror §6trading in Resources §rlike §bDiamonds §ror §8Coal.
§r§lWhat are Resources?
§r§6Resources §rare various ores Players can §6mine in a Minecraft world. §rSee §6below §r for more information about the Bank.
§r§lHow can Players earn Moneyz?
§r§6Players earn Moneyz §6by applying for jobs §ror §6exchanging Resources §rfor Moneyz §6at ATM NPC §rSee §6below §rfor more information about the Bank.
§r§lCan Players turn Moneyz back to Resource?
§r§6Yes!. §rPlayers can see an §6ATM NPC §rto §6exchange Moneyz §rfor Resources. §rSee §6below §rfor more information about the Bank.
§r§lCan Players sell items?
§r§6Yes! §rPlayers can §6go to the shop §rof the items they're selling. §rSee §6below §rfor more information about Selling.
§r§lHow can Players see what items are available?
§r§6Players can §6see a Help NPC or go to the Shop §rto see all §6items available and their price.
§r§lCan Players send Moneyz to other Players?

§r§6Yes! §rPlayers can send Moneyz §6through the Moneyz Menu. §rJust §6select a friend from the list and enter an amount to send
 §rSee §6below §rfor more information about the Moneyz Menu.
§r§lHow can Players learn more about Moneyz?
§r§6Players can see §6all helps categories at the Help NPC.
§lWhat Is the Moneyz Menu?

§rThe Moneyz Menu is a §6menu Player can access that allows §6direct Moneyz management from the Players inventory, and allows World Owners/Admins to manage the moneyz economy.

§rPlayers can:
Buy
Sell
Send Moneyz
Exchange Resources
View Help

World Owners/Admins can:
View Players Tags
View Players Moneyz Balances
Add/Remove/Set Players Moneyz Balance
Add/Remove Players Tags
§r§lHow do Players access the Moneyz Menu?

§rPlayers can access the Moneyz Menu by §6crafting a Moneyz Menu item.
§rPlayers can §6combine 1 of each resource in the crafting table §rto craft a Moneyz Menu item or purchase one from the Workshop.
§r§lWhy can't I access all of the options in the Moneyz Menu?

§rTo access Shops, ATMs, Send Moneyz, or Moneyz Admin features, §6Players must first obtain a moneyz tag.
§rThese are the available Tags:
moneyzShop
moneyzATM
moneyzSend
moneyzAdmin

§rMoneyz Economy 1.7.0 comes with an §6autotagging feature that can auto apply these moneyzTags,§r that World Owners/Admins with the §6moneyzAdmin §rtag can §6enable/disable each tag individially from the Moneyz Menu.
§lWhat is the Bank for?
§r§6Moneyz Economy §rallows Players to §6exchange Resources such as §7Iron §6or §6Copper §6for Moneyz with 'ATM' NPCs.
§rA Bank is where Players can make these exchanges.
§r§lWhat is an ATM NPC?
§rATM NPCs are where Players are able to §6exchange their Resources for Moneyz and vice versa.§r
§r§lWhat if a Player wants to exchange more than 1 Resource?

§rPlayers are able to §6exchange 1 Resource for Moneyz§r at ATM NPCs, this can be tedious if the Player §6wants to exchange large amounts of Resources. §rTo help this process, §6Bankers can exchange Resources for larger value Resource.

§rFor Example if a Player wanted to §6exchange 1 Gold (25 Moneyz) and 1 Diamond (75 Moneyz) §rfor Moneyz, they could §6ask the banker to exchange their 1 Gold Ingot (25 Moneyz) and 1 Diamond (75 Moneyz) for 1 Emerald (100 Moneyz).
§rThis allows the Player to §6exchange all their Resources in less transactions §rat the ATM NPCs.
§r§oSee §6below §r§ofor the exchange rate between Moneyz and Resource.
§lWhat is Real Estate?
§r§6Moneyz Economy §rallows Players to rent §6residential buildings to live in.§r
§r§lHow do Players rent Real Estate?

§rPlayers §6make an appointment with the Realtor at the Real Estate Ofiice §rto show them §6available Residential buildings in their budget. §rWhen the Realtor and Player come to an §aagreement §rthey can go to the §6Real Estate office to make a Down Payment. §rAfter this transaction the Player is free in live in the house, and the §6Realtor will take rent every 7 Minecraft Days. §cThis can make your Moneyz balance go below 0 if you don't have enough so budget accordingly!§r
§r§lHow do Players sell Real Estate?

§rPlayers §6make an appointment with the Realtor §rto §6schedule an Inspection of the Property. §rThey will check to make sure the house is not destroyed, or missing any main furniture. §6If the inspection §apasses §6the Realtor will go to the Real Estate office and §arefund §6your deposit. If the inspection §cfails, §6the realtor will informationrm you what changes need to be made to refund your deposit.
§rPlayers should also go to the Real Estate office to remove the Citizen Tag to avoid misleading 'Rent Payed' messages in chat after getting their deposit back.
§lHow can Players sell their items?
§r§6Players can sell their items by §6going to the shop §rof the items they want to sell.
§r§lWhat are the selling prices?
§r§6The selling prices are the same as the items purchased from the shop.
§lHow do I setup Moneyz?
§rYou can easily setup Moneyz by running §6/function setup §r in chat.
§rThis will §6set up a Moneyz Scoreboard §rin your world, §6give you an NPC Spawn Egg §rgive you a §6moneyzAdmin §rtag, and give you a §6Moneyz Menu item.
§rYou'll use the Spawn Egg for §6all your shops and Moneyz realated commands.
§rThe Moneyz Menu item will allow you to §6manage Player scores and tags §rif ever needed.
§rTo setup your shops
§rSpawn a NPC and §6enter it's menu.
§rFrom here you can §6choose the look and name §ryou want.
§rNext go to §6Edit Dialogue §rand §6enter the text you want §rthe NPC to say.
§rNext go to §6Advanced Settings §rand change the §6command to a Button type.
§rThis is where the Player §6will choose to to Buy or Sell.
§rThe commands will follow §6/dialogue open @s @initiator (shop)_(buy|sell)
§rFor example §6/dialogue open @s @initiator workshop_sell
§rDo this for all your §6Shops §rand now you have a §6working Moneyz Economy for everyone to enjoy!
§r§lAlternatively you can run §6/dialogue change @e[type=npc,r=5,c=1] (shop) §r§lin chat next to an NPC to automatically set a preconfigured dialogue and commands.
§rFor example §6/dialogue change @e[type=npc,r=5,c=1] petshop
§r§lWorld Owners/Admins §6can also update their NPCs §r§lwith this if §6§lupdating from versions previous to 1.6.0

§r§lTip You can setup each item individually.
 Just use the /function command instead
§rFor example §6/function farmer/apple
§r§lTip You can follow the autocomplete in chat to help guide you.
§lTip You don't need / for NPC commands.
§lWhat are the available dialogues?

§rThese are the available dialogues:
armory
armory_buy
armory_sell
atm
banker
craftershop
crafter_buy
crafter_sell
farmers_market
farmer_buy
farmer_sell
help
hotel
jobs
library
library_buy
library_sell
petshop
petshpo_buy
petshop_sell
realtor
universal
workshop
workshop_buy
workshop_sell
§r§lWhat are some recommendations for setting up my shops?
§rSee §6below §rfor more information.
§r§lWhat if I don't want to setup my world for Moneyz?
§r§6You can checkout §6MountainSide Villages by ZVortex11325 §rto play a pre-built world built around Moneyz.
§r§lSee
§6github.com/DMedina559/minecraft
§r§lin your browser
§lWhat are some recommendations for setting up my shops?
§rBelow are all the recommendations made for World Owners/Admins setting up Moneyz in their world.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould build §lHelp NPCs §rin a general area to §l§6allow Players to get help wit Moneyz.

§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould setup §lNPCs §l§6with the /dialogue command §rso they don't have to §l§6setup each individual item §rand they'll §l§6automatically update with new items when available.

§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould setup §la NPC or Command Block §rwith the §l§6tag add @p (tag) §rcommand so Players can §6access Moneyz Menu services.
§rSee §6Moneyz Menu §rin General Help for more information about the Moneyz Menu.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct a §lTown Hall or Employment Office §rto §l§6allow Players to interview, apply for and quit Jobs.

§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct a §lBank Building §rto set up the §l§6Bank NPCs for Players to make exchanges, §6§lallow Bankers to pay workers, and to make Resource exchanges for Players §r§lif not setting up NPCs with /dialogue.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould also §lstock the Bank Building §l§6with Resources for Bankers to make Player exchanges.

§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct a §lReal Estate Office §rto set up the Real Estate NPCs §l§6allow Players to manage real estate with an NPC, §rand §6§lallow the Realtor to sell previously rented houses and take rent from renters.

§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould also §linclude a 'Citizen Bot' §rso Players can §l§6avoid getting a misleading 'Rent Payed' messages in chat after they sell a house §r§lif not setting up NPCs with /dialogue.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould address their §lResidential Buildings §rto §l§6follow the addresses provided in the pack (i.e W1001).
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct Workshop NPCs with §l1 Block Air Space on all 4 sides.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould §lmake Builders OP §rto §l§6allow Builders to build NPC shops.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould §lconstruct a Jail §rto §l§6allow Cops a place of operations.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct a §lPostal Office §rto §l§6allow Players to easily set items in a chest to the desired address, and allow resident to pick up their items personally.

§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct a §lCommunity Center §rto §l§6allow Players a place to sell their goods to other Players, allow a Court system, allow the Mayor a place to plan events for the community, and to allow a place for Pastors to spread as much fear as possible.
§r§6World Owners/Admins §rshould construct a §lHotel §rfor the Hotel Owner job.

rawtext.text: §lWhat are Jobs?
§r§6Moneyz Economy §rincludes various §6job roles §rfor Players to apply for §6to start earning Moneyz, §rand help §6expand the Role Play aspect §rof §6each Minecraft world for every Player.
§r§oSee §6below §r§ofor more information on each job.
§r§lHow do Players Apply for jobs?
§rPlayers can §6go to Town Hall or Employment Office §rfor an interview and §6get an Apply tag §rfrom the NPC. They can then §6obtain the desired job.
§r§lHow do workers get payed?
§rBankers will have a §6NPC §rthey go to §6every 5 Minecraft days §rto auto §6deposit Moneyz to all online workers.§r
§r§lHow do Players Quit jobs?
§rPlayers can go to the §6Town Hall or Employment Office §6NPC to quit their current job.

§lWhat are Jobs?
§r§6Moneyz Economy §rincludes various §6job roles §rfor Players to apply for §6to start earning Moneyz, §rand help §6expand the Role Play aspect §rof §6each Minecraft world for every Player.
§r§oSee §6below §r§ofor more information on each job.
§r§lHow do Players Apply for jobs?
§rPlayers can §6go to Town Hall or Employment Office §rfor an interview and §6get an Apply tag §rfrom the NPC. They can then §6obtain the desired job.
§r§lHow do workers get payed?
§rBankers will have a §6NPC §rthey go to §6every 5 Minecraft days §rto auto §6deposit Moneyz to all online workers.§r
§r§lHow do Players Quit jobs?
§rPlayers can go to the §6Town Hall or Employment Office §6NPC to quit their current job.
§lWhat is an Assistant?
§rAn Assistant §6helps out the Mayor and Bankers. §rThey will be §6required to help the mayor and bankers §rkeep track of their respective duties.
§lHow much does an Assistant job pay?
§rThe Assistant job pays §62,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Banker?
§rA Banker §6is responsible for exchanging Resources §rfor clients, and §6sending payments to workers.
§r§lHow much does a Banker job pay?
§rThe Banker job pays §64,000 Moneyz every 5 Minecraft days §rby the Banker.
§lWhen does a Banker pay Workers?
§rThe Banker §6pays Moneyz to workers §rthrough an NPC §6every 5 days.
§lWhat does exchange Resources mean?

§rPlayers are able to §6exchange 1 Resource for Moneyz§r at ATM NPCs, this can be tedious if the Player §6wants to exchange large amounts of Resources. §rTo help this process, §6bankers can exchange Resources for larger value Resource.
§rFor Example if a Player wanted to §6exchange 2 Gold (25 Moneyz X 2) §rfor Moneyz, they could §6ask the banker to exchange their 2 Gold Ingots (25 X 2 Moneyz) for 1 Iron (50 Moneyz).
§rThis allows the Player to §6exchange all their Resources in less transactions §rat the ATM NPCs.
§lWhat is a Builder?
§rA Builder §6helps coordinate with the Mayor to expand the world, repair damaged properties, set up event areas §rand they may §6help residents with their redstone projects.
§r§lHow much does a Builder job pay?
§rThe Builder job pays §62,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Cop?
§rA Cop §6will respond to citizen complaints §rand §6conduct investigations on any wrong doing in the world.
§r§lHow much does a Cop job pay?
§rThe Cop job pays §62,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Delivery Person?
§rA Delivery Person §6delivers items §rin the post office to their requested destination. §6Residents may also request you to deliver items.
§r§lHow much does a Delivery Person job pay?
§rThe Delivery Person job pays §61,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Farmer?
§rA Farmer §6farms crops and livestock §rand §6delivers them to the Players. §rThey may §6also have other natural goods on sale for Resources.
§r§lHow much does a Farmer job pay?
§rThe Farmer job pays §61,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat does a Farmer do with their harvest?
§rFarmers can §6exchange their goods for Resources §rto Players.
§lWhat is a Fisher?
§rA Fisher §6goes out into the rivers and oceans to retrive anything of value §rand may §6have various goods from the waters on sale for Resources.
§r§lHow much does a Fisher job pay?
§rThe Fisher job pays §61,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat does a Fisher do with their catch?
§rFishers can §6exchange their goods for Resources §rto Players.
§lWhat is a Hotel Owner?
§rThe Hotel Owner §6runs the hotel and rents out the rooms §rto guest. It's their duty to §6keep track of what goes on with the guest and rooms of the hotel.
§r§lHow much does a Hotel Owner job pay?
§rThe Hotel Owner job pays §61,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lHow much does a Hotel Owner take Moneyz from Guest?
§rThe Hotel should have an §6NPC to allow guest to check in/out §rand a NPC to §6allow the Hotel Owner to charge for a night.
§r§lHow much does the Hotel cost?
§615 Moneyz for a Regular Room
§650 Moneyz for a Deluxe Room §rif available.
§lWhat is a Judge?
§rA Judge §6is requied to give netrual judgements §rfor world trials §6sending payments to workers. They will work with Lawyers to reach a virdict.
§r§lHow much does a Judge job pay?
§rThe Judge job pays §64,000 Moneyz every 5 Minecraft days §rby the Judge.
§lWhat is a Lawyer?
§rA Lawyer §6helps their clients in court.
§rThey're one part of the worlds Justice System.
§r§lHow much does a Lawyer job pay?
§rThe Lawyer job pays §63,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Mayor?
§rThe Mayor §6runs the world. §rthey are §6required to listen and solve the residents concerns, §rthey §6plan events §rfor the population, and §6makes plans to better the world.
§r§lHow much does a Mayor job pay?
§rThe Mayor job pays §64,000 Moneyz every 5 Minecraft days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Pastor?
§rA Pastor §6get payed big money to spread fear.
§r§lHow much does a Pastor job pay?
§rThe Pastor job pays §63,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker.
§lWhat is a Realtor?
§rThe Realtor §6sells residential buildings. §rThey are §6responsible for showing potential renters the available real estate, charging residents their rent, and selling off houses when requested.
§r§lHow much does a Realtor job pay?
§rThe Realtor job pays §63,000 Moneyz every 5 days §rby the Banker
§lWhat does a Realtor do?
§rAs a Realtor your job is to §6show your clients available properties §rfor rent in their price range.

§rIf a client §6wants to sell their property, §ryou are §6required to do an inspection before you can sell and refund the deposit. §rDurring the inspection §6make sure the property is not damaged and still includes the basic needs for living in.
§rIf you fail an inspection you will §6need to tell the client what needs to be done to pass another inspection §rbefore you can sell their house.
§rYou will also be §6collecting rent at the real estate office every 7 Minecraft days.
§rSee §6/function help/real_estate §rfor more information.
